Package it.polimi.ingsw.client.gui.controllers

Interface GuiController

All Known Implementing Classes:
ActionController, CreateOrLoadGameController, GameParametersController, LobbyController, LoginController
public interface GuiController

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    void
    askCharacterParameters(CharacterName name, GuiCharacterType characterType)
    Asks the user the correct parameters related to the selected character
    void
    receiveData(GameLobby lobby, GameState gameState, List<String> actions, String username)
    Receives the data from the server and draws the correct scene

  • Method Details

    • receiveData

      void receiveData(GameLobby lobby, GameState gameState, List<String> actions, String username)
      Receives the data from the server and draws the correct scene
      Parameters:
      lobby - the current GameLobby of the game
      gameState - the current GameState
      actions - the list of actions the user can choose from
      username - the username of the user who receives the data

    • askCharacterParameters

      void askCharacterParameters(CharacterName name, GuiCharacterType characterType)
      Asks the user the correct parameters related to the selected character
      Parameters:
      name - the CharacterName of the selected character
      characterType - the GuiCharacterType of the selected character
